thread.title: China’s HNA Makes Big Gain on Sale of Stake in Hilton Timeshare Unit

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: China’s HNA Makes Big Gain on Sale of Stake in Hilton Timeshare Unit

organizations.name: hilton timeshare unit hna group co.

text:
HNA Group Co.’s sale of its 25% stake in Hilton Grand Vacations sold at a price of $46.25 a share late Wednesday, raking in a big profit for the Chinese conglomerate as it continues to unload U.S. holdings. 
The secondary offering values HNA’s stake at $1.14 billion, giving the firm a more than 90% gain since acquiring the shares a year earlier.
...
